hero.name: Nikita Gorobets
hero.introText: Hi! I'm a web developer and designer from Kazan. I study at KFU in 'Information Systems and Technologies' and work in an electronic document management system. I create intuitive and effective web solutions for business and users.

layout.title: Website Layout

design.description: Designing intuitive and aesthetically pleasing interfaces in Figma.

development.description: Developing interactive web applications using Vue.js, Pinia, and TypeScript.

optimization.title: Speed Optimization
optimization.description: Improving your website's performance for fast loading and a better user experience.

adaptive.title: Responsive Layout
adaptive.description: Ensuring your site displays correctly on all devices, from smartphones to widescreen monitors.

ux.title: UX Research
ux.description: Analyzing user behavior to create products that solve real-world problems.

item1.title: Website for a Clinical Company
item1.description: Creating a modern website for a clinical company that provides patients with access to information about medical services, specialists, and procedures, as well as the ability to book appointments online. The site will be HIPAA compliant to protect sensitive data, include educational content to increase patient awareness, and be SEO optimized to attract new clients. The interface is designed with a focus on usability and visual appeal, which builds brand trust.
